synopsis: In the dystopian world of 2032 MegaTokyo, the Genom corporation, using its powerful androids, the Boomers, has become the world's most powerful organization - far too powerful.
Amoral Genom executive Brian Mason obtains a satellite weapons-control system and installs it in a Super-boomer, crafting the ultimate weapon.
The battle between the Knight Sabers and Genom escalates when Mason starts using Boomers to encourage urban renewal - on Genom's terms, of course.
A mysterious black car, the Griffon, is hunting down members of a rebellious biker gang.
Five young women die attempting to escape from an orbital colony, and in the resulting mayhem, a highly advanced combat suit goes missing.
The Knight Sabers have gone bad! They've attacked a Genom warehouse, murdered the guards, and stolen a valuable container of combat Boomers.
The mysterious Vision, a popular American singer, is ending a year-long sabbatical by launching a concert tour in MegaTokyo.
Aspiring reporter Lisa Vanette tries to get the hottest scoop of her young career, action shots of the Kight Sabers,
